Articles.Content:
Hello and welcome - can't have enough modders :-)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/30-Plugin-Development-Help-and-Support will probably be most useful to you, along with its parent sub-forum

Thanks for the warm welcome

I'll be sure to check those subforums.

Hi everyone! I've been playing for quite a while now (Thanks to youtube and scott manley!), but im new in the forum.

I'm from Argentina, and i dont know if there are anyone from my country here besides me

ALL HAIL KSP!

Huh, I never posted here? Well, now I have.

Hello, everyone!
Hi all, New to the forum and fairly new to KSP with a playtime of 90 hours. Looking for help to continue with real life
Finally joined the forums to join challenges. Been playing this game since .15 and I finally broke through my procrastination and made an account!
Hi all. Been playing since 0.18 and check out the forums regularly and finally decided I should join in too.

Hi there!

I've been playing KSP for a few months and finally got around to post here. Go Orion!
I've been playing for couple weeks. Still completely overwhelmed, but loving it.
Hello. Got KSP as a birthday gift and I thought it would be good to join the forums.
Welcome aboard Lt.Havoc
Thank you.
Got KSP the day it came out on Steam. I played a lot at first then waited for some of the updates that added content. New to the forums as I have started adding mods while I wait patiently for .90
Welcome to the forums! Glad to have you with us.
I've been playing KSP for a couple of months now. I've mastered the art of docking two vessels in 2 hours. For me, KSP is the game worth staying up all night for.(sometimes not sleeping at all)
How do I start a blog? I apologise if this has already been asked, but I haven't got the time to sift through 416 posts. Any help would be great. -Major999
To submit a blog to this forum? Go to the "blogs" link at the top of the page, and then choose "create new post" on the left.
Hi everyone, only 20 hours logged on KSP so far and just started getting the hang of downloading mods. The community here seems great and I like the look of the forums. I've got a lot to learn!
Hello! Finally bought this gem, glad to join the community! Sorry for my broken english, though:D

(edit: moving this to it's own post)

Edited January 6, 2015 by KerBlam

Ay, I'm not really new, but this account is... my old one is junk that i would to stay away from so i'm starting over from scratch

so yeah.

Hi all! New to the forums, but I'm a long-time player of KSP. Really digging the Beta, but I've got some trouble I'd like to shoot so I thought I'd join the forums and see if I could get some help. Wish me luck!

Hey everyone!

Always wanted to be an Astronaut. I watched "Spacecamp" so many times when I was a kid. Now I get to pretend I am one with KSP!

Currently about 25 hours into the game, playing stock normal difficulty campaign mode. Just got into low orbit on a rescue mission, now trying to figure out how to intersect a lost astronaut Good thinking: remembering to bring an extra command pod; Bad thinking: not learning the theory of orbital intersections before hand

I've been trying to get my girlfriend to get into it with me... help me navigate and plan in these early stages... but somehow I haven't been able to share the feeling of awesomeness and curiosity that comes from playing. I think I'm gonna have to get her to play some of the tutorials and maybe a scenario on her own first. Hmmmm.

Anyone out their play collaboratively with their partners?

Heh, good luck, dude! I tried to introduce my SO to KSP, and she was practically bored to tears. Oh, well, different strokes and whatnot, as long as she doesn't make me choose between her and my Kerbals....

Buahahaha, now I realize why this rescue mission has been so impossible - I had upgraded the tracking station to see patched conics but hadn't upgraded mission control for flight planning! I was doing all the burns by the seat of my pants! hahahaha. Closest I got was 4km but I wrecked the intersection trajectory on the final approach and couldn't reestablish it with my remaining fuel... so close.

I barely have enough cash to upgrade both... just like 13k left after launch.
